meta.description: Traveling Salesman Problem with 5 cities and specific distance matrix.

sets.name: CITIES
sets.description: Set of cities including the starting city.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if the path from city i to city j is taken.

objective.name: min_total_distance
objective.expr: sum(d[i][j] * x[i][j] for i in CITIES for j in CITIES)

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_0
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['0'][j] for j in CITIES if j != '0')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesman leaves city 0 exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['1'][j] for j in CITIES if j != '1')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesman leaves city 1 exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['2'][j] for j in CITIES if j != '2')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesman leaves city 2 exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['3'][j] for j in CITIES if j != '3')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesman leaves city 3 exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_4
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['4'][j] for j in CITIES if j != '4')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesman leaves city 4 exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_city_once_0
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['0'] for i in CITIES if i != '0')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesman enters city 0 exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_city_once_1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['1'] for i in CITIES if i != '1')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesman enters city 1 exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_city_once_2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['2'] for i in CITIES if i != '2')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesman enters city 2 exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_city_once_3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['3'] for i in CITIES if i != '3')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesman enters city 3 exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_city_once_4
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['4'] for i in CITIES if i != '4')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesman enters city 4 exactly once.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_1
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities 0 and 1.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_2
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities 0 and 2.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_3
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities 0 and 3.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_4
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities 0 and 4.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_5
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities 1 and 2.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_6
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities 1 and 3.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_7
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities 1 and 4.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_8
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities 2 and 3.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_9
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities 2 and 4.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_10
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities 3 and 4.
